name: The Party Of A Lifetime
description:
DJ Which is you, is hosting a party of a LIFETIME

But a Cop shows up and tries to shut it down

Keep your party alive

This is not my actual game I made this just for practice in 2 days so please ignore if you spot any bugs

And for those who are thinking YES this game idea is inspired by the brackeys game jam idea

Credit For 3D Models(Just Furniture):- DJKorou

Cheers :)

Safal.Tech
